hero_subtitle: Shop the latest trends with our curated collection of high-quality products at unbeatable prices.
luxury_products_description: Discover luxury products with exceptional quality and service.
technology_description: Stay ahead with cutting-edge electronics and smart devices.
fashion_description: Express yourself with our curated fashion collection.
handpicked_selection: Discover our handpicked selection of premium items
newsletter_description: Subscribe to receive updates on new products and offers.
try_adjusting_search: Try adjusting your search or filter criteria
trusted_destination: Your trusted destination for premium products and exceptional shopping experience.
about_page_description: Learn more about POStore - our mission, values, and the team behind our premium e-commerce platform.
about_page_subtitle: Discover our story, mission, and the team behind your favorite online store.
our_story_description: POStore started with a simple mission: to provide a premium e-commerce platform that empowers businesses to reach their customers and drive growth.
our_story_paragraph_1: What began as a small online idea has grown into a comprehensive e-commerce platform offering a wide range of high-quality products across multiple categories. Our journey has been defined by our commitment to customer satisfaction and product excellence.
our_story_paragraph_2: Today, we are committed to providing our customers with the best possible shopping experience, whether they're shopping online or in-store. We strive to exceed expectations in every aspect of our business, from the products we offer to the customer service we provide.
our_story_paragraph_3: We believe that great products should be accessible to everyone, and we are dedicated to making that happen. Whether you're a busy professional, a student, or a family member, we have you covered.
our_story_paragraph_4: Thank you for choosing POStore. We look forward to serving you and helping you achieve your shopping goals.
our_mission_description: Deliver premium products, exceptional shopping experiences, and build lasting relationships with our customers.
ui_experience_description: We carefully design and develop our user interface to ensure a smooth and intuitive shopping experience for our customers. We listen to our customers, understand their needs, and create a user interface that meets their expectations. We take the privacy and security of our customers' personal information seriously and implement industry practices to protect their data.
customer_focus_description: Every decision we make is guided by our commitment to providing an exceptional shopping experience for our customers.
sustainability_description: We are committed to reducing our environmental impact through sustainable practices and eco-friendly product options.
developer_description: Software Developer with over 10 years in code projects and e-commerce innovation.
download_app_description: Get POStore on your PC device
windows_10_later: Available for Windows 10 and later versions
app_features_benefits: Learn more about the app's features and benefits
app_description: Manage your shopping cart, track orders, direct POS sales, product inventory, categories and more, all in one place from your PC. The POStore app provides a seamless experience for managing your online store and, of course, a local POS that you can use to sell your products in person wherever you are.
admin_page_description: Admin panel for managing products and orders
go_to_store_for_business: Go to Store for this Business

display_name_must_be_one_word: Display name must be one word.

product_id_already_exists: Product ID already exists for this business.

search_view_orders_description: Search and view customer orders for your business.
enter_email_to_view_orders: Enter a customer email to view their orders

customer_no_orders_yet: This customer has no orders yet.
no_items_found_for_order: No items found for this order
contact_us_description: We'd love to hear from you. Get in touch with our team.
subject: Subject
thank_you_message: Thank you for your message! We'll get back to you shortly.
failed_to_send_message: Failed to send message. Please try again later.
faq_description: Find answers to common questions about our products and services.
faq_browse_description: Browse through our most frequently asked questions to find quick answers to your inquiries.
what_is_postore_answer: POStore is a premium online shopping destination offering high-quality products across multiple categories including electronics, fashion, and home goods. We curate our selection to ensure every product meets our standards for quality, design, and value.
how_create_account: How do I create an account?
no_account_needed: No account is needed to browse our products and make purchases or track your orders.
products_brand_new_answer: Yes, all products sold on POStore are brand new and authentic. Unless product description says otherwise, we work directly with manufacturers and authorized distributors to ensure the quality and authenticity of every item we sell.
how_contact_customer_service: How can I contact customer service?
contact_customer_service_answer: You can contact our customer service team through multiple channels: by email at support@postore.com, by phone at +1 (800) 123-4567 (Monday-Friday, 9am-6pm EST), or by filling out the contact form on our Contact page.
shipping_times_answer: Standard shipping typically takes 3-5 business days within the continental US. Express shipping options are available at checkout for 1-2 business day delivery. International shipping times vary by destination, generally taking 7-14 business days.
international_shipping_answer: Yes, we ship to most countries worldwide. International shipping rates and delivery times are calculated at checkout based on your location and the items in your cart. Please note that customers are responsible for any import duties or taxes that may apply.
customer_support_help_description: Our customer support team is here to help you with any other questions you might have.
support_description: We're here to help with any issues or questions you may have.
email_support_description: Send us an email and we'll get back to you within 24 hours.
phone_support_description: Call us directly for urgent matters or complex issues.
common_issues_description: Quick solutions to frequently encountered problems
track_order_answer: Once your order ships, you'll receive a confirmation email with a tracking number. You can use this number to track your package on our website under "Orders" in the main menu or directly through the carrier's website.
order_delayed_answer: Order delays can occur due to high demand, weather conditions, or carrier issues. Please check your tracking information for the most up-to-date status. If your order is significantly delayed, contact our support team.
failed_to_submit_support_ticket: Failed to submit support ticket. Please try again later.
